page.title: 19Population
page.content: As will be realised the area is a rural one and as such the population is not too large . The two villages are very different in constitution and size.Croft has a relatively contracting population since there is no new expected building in the village.There is a growing older population in the village and a contracting younger one .This has been evidenced by the school population falling. The population of the village is approximately 1900 with an under 16 population of about 400.The village of Stoney Stanton has expanded recently with a new estate of approximately 150 homes.The village population is much larger than Croft, almost double in size.With a still expanding population the range of ages and their relative sizes has meant a greater need for facilities.
